verses.name: Acts 8:22
verses.text: Repent therefore of this thy wickedness, and pray God, if perhaps the thought of thine heart may be forgiven thee.

verses.name: Acts 8:23
verses.text: For I perceive that thou art in the gall of bitterness, and in the bond of iniquity.

verses.name: Acts 8:24
verses.text: Then answered Simon, and said, Pray ye to the Lord for me, that none of these things which ye have spoken come upon me.

verses.name: Acts 8:25
verses.text: And they, when they had testified and preached the word of the Lord, returned to Jerusalem, and preached the gospel in many villages of the Samaritans.
